{{cpp/keyword/title|{{tt|export}}}}
{{cpp/keyword/navbar}}

===Usage===
{{rrev multi
|until1=c++11|rev1=
Used to mark a [[cpp/language/class template|template definition]] ''exported'', which  allows the same template to be declared, but not defined, in other translation units.
|until2=c++20|rev2=
''The keyword is unused and reserved.''
|rev3=
Marks a declaration, a group of declarations, or another [[cpp/language/modules|module]] as exported by the current [[cpp/language/modules|module]].
}}
